title: Ep 168: East vs West, Feeling Guilty about Hating Your Parents and More!
description: In this last episode before I go on Maternity leave, I discuss what I've learned from the East and the West in terms of self help. Also a woman writes in feeling guilty she doesn't love being with her mom on Mother's Day. A girl wants to know how to maintain a relationship with her Bi-Polar father. Another woman wants to know if having children will ruin her great marriage. All this and more. Let's get deep, bros!
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
